title: Now We Bake
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: Most students love the taste of a freshly baked cake! Now We Bake! shows one little girl's step-by-step process of baking a cake from start to finish. Colorful illustrations accompany simple text and support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to visualize to understand the text as well as to sequence events in a story.
meta: bake, frost, pour, serve, shop, wait
Sequence Events : Determine the sequence of events
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words now and we

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
